content: The biggest change from here on out is that it introduces a fiery unicycle into the mix. This will make it easier for him to move around the arena, but he'll also kick it out and send this to attack you independently. When this is introduced, he'll be able to burn you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Supreme Inspector'.
The content is as follows:
The biggest change from here on out is that it introduces a fiery unicycle into the mix. This will make it easier for him to move around the arena, but he'll also kick it out and send this to attack you independently. When this is introduced, he'll be able to burn you.
